mapper.select: select count(*) from member where member_email = #{memberEmail}

select * from (select rownum as rnum, b.* from(SELECT MEMBER_EMAIL,MEMBER_NICKNAME,MEMBER_NAME,MEMBER_ADDR1,MEMBER_ADDR2,MEMBER_ADDR3,MEMBER_LEVEL,MEMBER_PROFILE,ENROLL_DATE,LOGIN_TYPE,MEMBER_PHONE from member order by 1 desc)b) where rnum BETWEEN #{start} and #{end}
mapper.update: update member set member_level=#{memberLevel} where member_email=#{memberEmail}
mapper.select: select login_type from member where member_email=#{memberEmail} and member_name=#{memberName}
